name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
description: A simple tool to encode text to Base64 and decode Base64 back to text

api_endpoints.description: Encode plain text to Base64 and persist the operation to history
Decode a Base64 string back to plain text and persist the operation
Retrieve conversion history ordered from newest to oldest

backend_requirements: Implement POST /api/encode to accept JSON with `text` and return JSON with `encoded_text` and timestamp
Implement POST /api/decode to accept JSON with `encoded_text` and return JSON with `decoded_text` and timestamp
Handle encoding/decoding errors gracefully with proper error messages
Store conversion history with timestamps in SQLite database
Provide GET /api/history endpoint returning conversion history in reverse chronological order
frontend_requirements: Text area for input (plain text or Base64)
Toggle or tabs to switch between Encode and Decode modes
Text area to display the result
Copy to clipboard button for the result
Error messages for invalid Base64 input during decode
Call POST /api/encode and POST /api/decode for conversions and GET /api/history to refresh the list
